attributes.action: discontinue plans for future legislation where public opinion is outstandingly against that legislation being passed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the governent to discontinue plans for future legislation where public opinion is outstandingly against that legislation being passed. A recent point being the governments road pricing proposals. Where this is the case, any plans to introduce pilot schemes yet to be initiated, should be discontinued immediately.
